attributes.action: REDUCE the tax burden by taking PROPER responsibility for spending on large projects
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Dome, The Olympics, the NHS/doctors computer system, the Inland Revenue computer system, the CSA.

These are all projects where the final cost runs into £billions, or at 4x to 8x the original cost estimate.

For our sake and that of our children, you, the government, take some responsibility for this. Stop awarding these obviously extremely lucrative contracts to big corporates who only know how to rip us all off and somehow get you to agree to it.

How imcompetent (or plain greedy) these people must be to be unable to provide proper costs and plans and stick to them. And how lax of government officials to let it happen.

STOP IT NOW.
